```{webr-r}

webr::install("ManifoldDestinyWASMP", repos = "https://lotariohw26.github.io/MD_WASMC")
webr::install("ManifoldDestinyWASMD", repos = "https://lotariohw26.github.io/MD_WASMC")
library(ManifoldDestinyWASMP)
library(ManifoldDestinyWASMD)
#ls(package:ManifoldDestinyWASMP)
#data(package='ManifoldDestinyWASMD')
apps <- appn0
```

```{webr-r}
adat <- apps[[1]]
amet <- apps[[2]]
cob <- Countinggraphs(adat)
cob$purging(z=0) 
def <- Estimation(cob$rdfce)
```

```{webr-r}
def$regression("alpha=k0 + k1*g + k2*h")
summary(def$regsum[[1]])
```

```{webr-r}
def$regression("alpha=k0 + k1*g + k2*h + k3*g**2 + k4*h**2 + k5*g*h + k6*h**3 + k7*g*h + k8*g**2*h + k9*g*h**2")
summary(def$regsum[[1]])
```


```{r, echo=F}
knitr::knit_exit()
```















```{r, echo=F}
suppressMessages(ManifoldDestiny::wasmconload()) 
apps <- appn0
adat <- apps[[1]]
amet <- apps[[2]]
cob <- Countinggraphs(adat,selvar=names(adat))
sum(dplyr::select(cob$rdfci,S,T,U,V))
cob$purging(z=amet$prg$z,pri=1) 
cob$plext(2)
sum(dplyr::select(cob$rdfce,S,T,U,V))
def <- Estimation(cob$rdfce)
def$regression("alpha=k0 + k1*g + k2*h")
summary(def$regsum[[1]])
```

```{r}
def$regression("alpha=k0 + k1*g + k2*h")
summary(def$regsum[[1]])
```


```{r}
def$regression("alpha=k0 + k1*g + k2*h + k3*g**2 + k4*h**2 + k5*g*h + k6*h**3 + k7*g*h + k8*g**2*h + k9*g*h**2")
summary(def$regsum[[1]])
```



```{r, echo=F}
knitr::knit_exit()
```



```{webr-r}
#| echo: fenced
#| eval: true
webr::install("ManifoldDestinyWASMP", repos = "https://lotariohw26.github.io/MD_WASMC")
webr::install("ManifoldDestinyWASMD", repos = "https://lotariohw26.github.io/MD_WASMC")
library(ManifoldDestinyWASMP)
library(ManifoldDestinyWASMD)
ls(package:ManifoldDestinyWASMP)
data(package='ManifoldDestinyWASMD')
dfl <- ManifoldDestinyWASMD::yout
```

```{r, echo=F}
knitr::knit_exit()
```




```{webr-r}
coi <- Countingprocess(dfl[[1]])
ges <- Estimation(coi$rdfc,2)
ges$regression("alpha=k0+k1*g+k2*h")
ges$diagnostics()
broom::tidy(ges$regsum[[1]])
broom::glance(ges$regsum[[1]])
```
